creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: white textile with multicolored embroidery at chest, shoulders, and back; embroidery is predominantly purple and consists of animal motifs and geometric patterns; horse motifs decorate shoulder area; sleeves consist of slits cut at sides and are decorated with solid purple embroidery with a multicolored zig zag; neck opening consists of vertical slit
title: Huipil
